name: Palmyra: The Lost Tomb
description:
PALMYRA : The Lost Tomb is a game about scavanging treasure hidden in the tomb of an ancient king. player is a scavanger that searching for the treasure (in the form of cards) and compete with other scavanger in other to gain the most point. the one that gain the most point is the winner

Source Code for the Game : https://github.com/Vijaz555/Palmyra
